import React, { useState } from 'react' const LoginForm = ({ startLogin }) => { // States for tracking form input which are the email address and password const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const handleLogin = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const credentials = { email, password } startLogin(credentials) setEmail('') setPassword('') } return (
